item.title: The Holy Grail and the Programmer's High
item.description: Dave Winer, the inventor of RSS, wrote today about twitter’s latest API update for supporting the lists feature It turns out there’s an API call that retrieves the timeline for a list, and it works exactly like the API call that retrieves the timeline for an account. So much so that I didn’t even have to change the glue script, I pass in a different URL and it just worked > orig link
